text:
When I run startup.bat a second window opens but this quickly closes, i.e. Help 
please!
Tomcat aborts presumably. I worked out the startup.bat script runs Catalina. 
When I type catalina run at the dos prompt I get the following:

Using CATALINA_BASE:   ..
Using CATALINA_HOME:   ..
Using CATALINA_TMPDIR: ..\temp
Using JAVA_HOME:       c:\jdk1.3
[ERROR] Digester - -Begin event threw error
